name: SomeoneSurprised
0:
”Alexa, open someone surprised”
”Alexa, start someone surprised”
”Alexa, launch someone surprised”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: someone surprised
des: Have Alexa repeat your phrase after a delay of your choosing by saying: "Alexa, tell/ask Someone Surprised [say your phrase] in/after [say any delay in minutes or seconds less than 11 minutes]" . For example: "Alexa, tell Someone Surprised 'good morning, welcome to the kitchen' in 55 seconds." Or, another example: "Alexa, ask Someone Surprised after 10 minutes 'are you just going to sit there all morning?" Try to predict when someone will be within earshot and leave a surprising message for them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
